Repeat: k1, p1, k1, (p1 wrapping the yarn twice around the needle) 4 times, k1

p1; sl 4 wyif, dropping extra loops for each stitch; return the four stitches to the left needle and k4-tog retaining them on the left needle; p4-tog in the same 4 stitches; then k4-tog and p4-tog in the same 4 stitches, drop original stitches from the left needle; p2, k1
